column4: Do the torrent programs work in text mode? Or are they purely gui?
there are text only bt clients
I apt-get install'd it but i can't seem to run it :/
you can use "dpkg -c " to view the contents of a .deb, "cd /var/cache/apt/archives/", and check the .deb
i have the contents on my screen, what should i do with them
try to pipe it to "|grep bin" , or to "|less"
if they are in /usr/bin/, you can try to run them
heh, there are many "runnables" but none of them seem to just run and download a .torrent file :/
can you /msg me? I will check the list for you. sorry, I'm not running ubuntu myself
